message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $140?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product. Can you consider that?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
